content: our favorite combination of techniques to create an easy enjoyable and well-fitting but not too tight sock include a judy s magic cast-on and a fleegle heel this is a full tutorial with step-by-step instructions including links to the best tutorials we ve found for all the stitches you need to know it would be great for your very first foray into socks toe-up socks specifically or sock design we ve recently updated the pattern to include directions for a larger calf size as well
